title: Diet and Coronavirus - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/20
itunes:title: Diet and Coronavirus - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/20
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and Dr. John McDougall discuss his theories that people at high risk of complications from the coronavirus can improve their odds of survival through dietary changes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
